pullrequest.title: Use one-liners as default installation method for gazebo7 in Linux and Mac

content.raw:
How we want to handle non main scenarios, being then main scenario the one in which the user has no gazebo package installed.

From the top of my head, we need to decide what to do when:

 * There is a different major version installed in the system
 * The user has the ROS (indigo/jade) desktop-full installed in the system
 * There is a different minor version installed in the system
 * There are other OSRF repositories installed in the system
